rationale: Operator variation: replace the Gaussian-based Gaussian quantile transform with a direct time-series rank (ts_rank). This changes how the lookback distribution is mapped into the signal, potentially affecting normalization and sensitivity to outliers.
Group normalization change: replace group_rank with group_zscore to standardize the alpha within each industry, producing a cross-sectional z-score rather than a strict ranking.
Parameter modification: shorten the lookback from 57 to 36 days to capture more recent cash-flow dynamics and potentially increase turnover responsiveness.
Complementary operator: add a smoothing step (ts_mean with a 10-day window) before the Gaussian quantile to reduce noise and emphasize more persistent signals.
Operator replacement: substitute division by enterprise_value with an explicit inverse operator (inverse(x) = 1/x) to represent the same arithmetic using a different operator.
